name: Vanilla
script_install:
#!/bin/ash
# Vanilla Installation Script
cd /mnt/server

if [ -z "${MINECRAFT_VERSION}" ] || [ "${MINECRAFT_VERSION}" == "latest" ]; then
    MANIFEST_URL="https://launchermeta.mojang.com/mc/game/version_manifest.json"
    # Get the latest release version
    VERSION=$(curl -s $MANIFEST_URL | jq -r '.latest.release')
else
    VERSION=${MINECRAFT_VERSION}
fi

echo "[Atlas] Target Version: $VERSION"

# Fetch Version Manifest
MANIFEST_URL="https://launchermeta.mojang.com/mc/game/version_manifest.json"
VERSION_URL=$(curl -s $MANIFEST_URL | jq -r --arg VER "$VERSION" '.versions[] | select(.id == $VER) | .url')

if [ -z "$VERSION_URL" ]; then
    echo "[Atlas] Error: Version $VERSION not found."
    exit 1
fi

# Fetch Server Download URL
DOWNLOAD_URL=$(curl -s $VERSION_URL | jq -r '.downloads.server.url')

echo "[Atlas] Downloading from $DOWNLOAD_URL..."
curl -o ${SERVER_JARFILE} $DOWNLOAD_URL
echo "eula=true" > eula.txt
